name: Horizontal A-Z Record Divider Set Mrs Eaves
description: Production on this item will begin again in January 2014 Organize your music collection and find your favorite music quickly and easily with alphabetical record dividers. These sleek laser cut wood panels with engraved A-Z alphabet will keep your audiophile house in order. Product details: -Set includes 26 dividers with tabs -Laser cut and engraved maple -Each wood divider has a 2 x 2 inch tab engraved with elegant serif typeface, Mrs Eaves -Each tab is engraved on the front and back Measurements: 13 7/8 inches wide (includes tab) 11 7/8 inches tall 1/4 inch thick 14.6 lbs total weight Note: This set is designed for 12 inch vinyl records stored horizontally like books on a bookshelf. For records stored vertically, check out our other listing, Vertical Mrs Eaves All of our products are made to order. Production may take up to 7 business days. Once your order is complete and packaged for shipment, we will email you with an estimated delivery date. Shipping is $30 via UPS Ground shipping for all US orders. Limited local pick-up options are available to Bay Area residents. Shipping costs can be waived for local orders at checkout. Use discount code “locallovers” at checkout to get free shipping on your order.

name: Vertical A-Z Record Divider Set Mrs Eaves
description: limited production for the end of the year, only a few sets remain! Organize your music collection and find your favorite music quickly and easily with alphabetical record dividers. These sleek laser cut wood panels with engraved A-Z alphabet will keep your audiophile house in order. Set includes 26 dividers with staggered tabs. Each wood divider has a 2 x 2 inch tab with a single letter of the alphabet, engraved with elegant serif typeface, Mrs Eaves. Product details: -Set includes 26 dividers with staggered tabs -Laser cut and engraved maple -Each tab is engraved with a single letter on the front side of tab only. Measurements: 13 7/8 inches tall (includes tab) 11 7/8 inches wide 1/4 inch thick 14.6 lbs total weight Note: This set is designed for 12 inch vinyl records stored vertically like music in a record shop. For records stored horizontally, check out our other listing: Horizontal Mrs Eaves All of our products are made to order. Production may take up to 7 business days. Once your order is complete and packaged for shipment, we will email you with an estimated delivery date. Shipping is $30 via UPS Ground shipping for all US orders. Limited local pick-up options are available to Bay Area residents. Shipping costs can be waived for local orders at checkout. Use discount code “locallovers” at checkout to get free shipping on your order.
